message: Let's split it 50/50, no need to negotiate!
I'll give you a good deal, but I want more!
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking the majority!
I'm not going down without a fight! Meet me in the middle!
You're getting close to empty pockets, it's time to give in!
I'm still holding out for a better deal! You're not getting the whole pie!
